definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: While the oil is cooling mix your methanol and NaOH(lye) to form the methoxide.
sentences.chinese: 当食用油冷却时，先将甲醇和氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: Hydrolysis was going on in sodium hydroxide solution.
sentences.chinese: 水解在氢氧化钠溶液中进行。

sentences.english: A grayish white granular mixture of sodium hydroxide and calcium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 灰白色颗粒状氢氧化钠和氢氧化钙混合物。

sentences.english: Sodium reacts violently with water to produce hydrogen gas and sodium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 钠与水剧烈反应生成氢气和氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: An improved direct extraction method for preparation of neodymium iso-octanate with NaOH instead of NH 3·H 2O was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 用氢氧化钠溶液代替氨水直接萃取法制备异辛酸钕。

sentences.english: Formaldehyde mixed with acetaldehyde and gradually adding sodium hydroxide as reactor.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛和乙醛混合，逐渐加入氢氧化钠到反应装置。

sentences.english: They include water into which she has dissolved lye, or sodium hydroxide.
sentences.chinese: 它们包括水，她已经解体成碱液，或氢氧化钠。

sentences.english: The chitosan filaments can be formed through extruding chitosan into the dilute sodium hydroxide solution.
sentences.chinese: 壳聚糖溶液在氢氧化钠稀溶液中可凝固成丝。

sentences.english: If you are using new oil this will require 5 g (about one level Teaspoon) NaOH.
sentences.chinese: 如果使用新食用油需要使用5克氢氧化钠。
